author: Pat McGrath
title: Virus measures pose 'massive problem' for Ploughing
description: The organisers of the National Ploughing Championships have said social distancing at the exhibition in September would pose a massive problem and if there is any risk to the public, the championships "won't be happening".
content:
The organisers of the National Ploughing Championships have said social distancing at the exhibition in September would pose a massive problem and if there is any risk to the public, the championships "won't be happening".
